issue.title: [Python] FileFormat::GetReaderAsync hangs with an fsspec filesystem
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16413](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16413). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://github.com/dask/dask/pull/8993 for details. 

When using an fsspec filesystem (or maybe more generally a PyFileSystem), inspecting a file through the FileFormat.inspect is hanging (this eg happens in ParquetDatasetFactory)
